member.name: T:ReportPortal.Core.Tests.BaseTest
member.summary: Base test class for Selenium tests. Provides setup and teardown methods.

member.name: F:ReportPortal.Core.Tests.BaseTest.driver
member.summary: The WebDriver instance used for test automation. It can be accessed and manipulated by derived test classes.

member.name: M:ReportPortal.Core.Tests.BaseTest.BaseOneTimeSetUp
member.summary: One-time setup method for test run initialization.

member.name: M:ReportPortal.Core.Tests.BaseTest.BaseOneTearDown
member.summary: One-time teardown method for test run completion.

member.name: M:ReportPortal.Core.Tests.BaseTest.Initialize
member.summary: Initializes the WebDriver and navigates to the test URL.

member.name: M:ReportPortal.Core.Tests.BaseTest.BaseTearDown
member.summary: Cleans up and reports test results, including attaching screenshots if a test fails.
